name: DWAYNE LOCKARD
text: The worst Buffet I've ever had... The only thing edible was cinnamon sticks. Everything was cold service was horrible. The waitress attitude was as bad as the food

name: Ajay Tyagi
text: Bread stick n garlic bread was good. Pizza base is not baked properly. Service is not bad.

name: joel kell
text: Pizza and Breadsticks were good. Service was lacking. There was only one family there when we arrived and it took 40 minutes for them to get their pizza. It took 20 minutes for us to get our Breadsticks. I'm going back one more time and I …More

text: Horrible service when we told the server the number in our party she rolled her eyes. The food on Tue lunch buffet was barely warm and stale. The few times the server brought anything to our table our thanks were met with a grunt. The gent …More

name: KenFlor
text: They always have my pizza done quickly. taste  great

name: Madison Boyd-Sarber
text: Nice friendly service and great pizza buffet is always hot and fresh

name: TheFourohsix
text: Completely aweful every single time, really rude staff who are about as smart as a pile of bricks and soggy, cold pizza every time. Ordered a cheese pizza that was it, shows up soaked in grease, soggy as a towel and over saturated in sauce. …More

name: Tim Rose
text: Called to place a single pizza delivery order and was told there was a 2 HOUR WAIT. I live within 2 miles, it was prior to peak dinner time and on a non-holiday Tuesday. That is unaccaptable. Management should be doing a better job at …More

text: Love the Pizza but the breadsticks they need to make them softer

text: Love ur pizza and more but u need to update ur menu for hagerstown because only two kinds of wings to order for that location
